tasks.title: Archive current website
tasks.description: Create a _archive directory and move all existing site files and directories (index.html, css/, js/, fonts/, media/, uplds/) into it to preserve the current site.

tasks.title: Create new placeholder index.html
tasks.description: Build a minimal HTML page using IBM Plex Mono font (loaded from Google Fonts) that displays 'New Website - Spring 2026' perfectly centered both horizontally and vertically. Use the same font styling as the original site header (uppercase, letter-spacing: 3px).

tasks.title: Add rotating background color animation
tasks.description: Implement an infinite CSS/JS animation loop that cycles through three background colors from the original site: #403AE9 (mmhmm blue), #DC6872 (mmhmm OOO pink), #403D5A (Twisty Tongue dark purple). Each color fades to the next over 10 seconds, then the next transition begins 5 seconds later. The cycle repeats infinitely.
